videoData.title: Take back control of your personal data
videoData.socialTitle: Take back control of your personal data

nodes.whoTheyAre: Dr. Maria Dubovitskaya is a staff member at IBM Research Zurich designing and applying cryptographic protocols for privacy protection. She holds a Ph.D. in cryptography and privacy from ETH Zurich. She promotes science and tech for young girls with IBM EX.I.T.E. (Exploring Interests in Technology and Engineering), is a founder and co-leader of IBM Technical Excellence Council R/CIS.

videoData.description: Whether buying a bottle of wine, making an online purchase or going to a movie, most of us share far more information than is necessary: birthdates, credit card numbers, addresses. At a time when our personal information is at risk every day, cryptographer Dr. Maria Dubovitskaya is part of a team which has designed a system that shares only what's absolutely necessary while closely guarding the rest.
